desc: Fine, Hand-Made Crafts & Furniture. Handcrafted Products For Your Home and Yard, Interior décor, Seasonal décor.

layout.text: James Hubert, owner of Geppetto's, has been a woodworking artisan in Massachusetts' Pioneer Valley for over forty years. Some of his time was spent designing and building custom cabinetry, but now he is focused on fine furniture and crafts. All of his work is done by hand with a keen attention to detail.
